title: Two Figures: Turkish Bath
credit_line: Bequest of Mr. and Mrs. James H. Beal
provenance_text:
Charles Demuth [1883-1935], Lancaster, PA until 1935; Robert Locher, Lancaster, Pa., by descent, 1935; Mr. [1898-1987] and Mrs. James H. Beal (born Rebecca Huebley Jones) [1898-1993], Pittsburgh, PA, 1950 until February 14, 1987; Mrs. James H. Beal, Pittsburgh, PA, until April 23, 1993; bequest of Mr. and Mrs. James H. Beal to Carnegie Museum of Art, Pittsburgh, PA, February 1994.

Updated and under review by CGK.
